plugin.name: Tallimos_Winds_Extras
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.purpose: Extra Aliases and Triggers for Winds
plugin.description: Extra Aliases and Triggers for Winds

muclient.triggers:
<trigger enabled="y" match="^Market: (.+ has (proxy )?bid [\d,]+ gold on|Bid of [\d,]+ gold on|.+ is selling) (?.+) Fantasy Series Collector\'s Card \(Level 201, Num \d+\).?( Auction is for Gold\.)?$" omit_from_output="y" regexp="y" script="selling_winds" keep_evaluating="y" sequence="100" >
<trigger enabled="y" match="^Auction: (.+ has placed a bid for [\d,]+ gold on|.+ is auctioning) (?.+) Fantasy Series Collector\'s Card \(Level 201, Num \d+\).( Current bid is [\d,]+.)?$" omit_from_output="y" regexp="y" script="selling_winds" keep_evaluating="y" sequence="100" >
muclient.script:
require "tprint" require "mw_theme_base" require "serialize" require "commas" require "gmcphelper" require "copytable" require "aardmapper" require "aard_lua_extras" require "wait"
local msg_colour = "lightslategrey" local err_colour = "firebrick" local help_colour = "lightslategrey" local qty_colour = "cyan" local optional_colour = "lightcoral" local command_colour = "white" local cmd_required = "royalblue" local help_command_colour = "red"
local noteline = "=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=" local cline = "......................................................................"
local repchan = "tracker" local windshours = 0 local windsminutes = 0 local windsseconds = 0 WindsTable = {} gmcparea = "" gmcproomid = 0 casefocus = 5 WindsQP = 0
function MarketDisable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsDisable", 0) end -- MarketDisable
function MarketEnable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsDisable", 1)
end -- MarketEnable
function WindsQuestPoints(name, line, wc) local qp = tonumber(wc[1]) WindsQP = WindsQP + qp end -- WindsQuestPoints
function CheckWinds() SendNoEcho ("lbid -f treasure 201 201") end -- CheckWinds
function CheckDeck(name, line, wc) if wc[1] == nil or wc[1] == "" then ColourNote(err_colour, "", "Please choose a deck to display, 1-4") else local deck = tonumber(wc[1])
if deck == 1 then Deck1() elseif deck == 2 then Deck2() elseif deck == 3 then Deck3() elseif deck == 4 then Deck4() end end end -- CheckDeck

------------------------------------------- ------------ WINDS RUN SCRIPTS ------------ ------------------------------------------- function CagedRoom() Send ("wake")
GetRoom()
if tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39943 then Send ("search square") Send ("get key") Send ("up") Send ("open north") Send ("open south") elseif tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39937 then Send ("search cell") Send ("get key") Send ("up") Send ("open north") Send ("open south") elseif tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39953 then Send ("search hole") Send ("get key") Send ("up") Send ("open north") Send ("open south") elseif tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39948 then Send ("search floor") Send ("get key") Send ("up") Send ("open north") Send ("open south") elseif tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39943 then Send ("push square") Send ("get key") Send ("up") Send ("open north") Send ("open south") else Send ("search ice") Send ("search sludge") end end -- CagedRoom
function GetRoom() Send_GMCP_Packet("request room")
gmcparea = gmcp("room.info.zone") gmcproomid = gmcp("room.info.num") end -- GetRoom
function WindsUpdate(name, line, wc) local name = wc[1]
if name == nil or name == "" then else WindsTable[name]["Need"] = "NO" WindsTable[name]["Color"] = "GREEN" end end -- WindsUpdate
function WindsRunUpdateEnable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsRunUpdateTrigs", 1) end -- WindsRunUpdateEnable
function WindsRunUpdateDisable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsRunUpdateTrigs", 0) world.EnableGroup ("WindsRunNodHynes", 0) world.EnableGroup ("WindsRun", 0)
if WindsQP ~= 0 then Send ("tracker " .. "@DWinds QP Reward: @R" .. WindsQP .. " @DQP earned.@w") end
SaveState() end -- WindsRunUpdateDisable
function WindsUpdateEnable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsUpdateTrigs", 1) end -- WindsUpdateEnable
function WindsUpdateDisable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsUpdateTrigs", 0)
SaveState() end -- WindsUpdateDisable
function WindsLBid(name, line, args, styles) for i, s in ipairs(styles) do ColourTell(RGBColourToName(s.textcolour), "", s.text) end
local have = "" local name = args[2]
if WindsTable[args[2]]["Need"] == "YES" then have = "NEED" else have = "HAVE" end
if casefocus == 5 then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") else local focuscase = "Case " .. casefocus
if WindsTable[name]["Case"] == focuscase then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") end end end -- WindsLBid
function inventory_winds(name, line, args, styles) for i, s in ipairs(styles) do ColourTell(RGBColourToName(s.textcolour), "", s.text) end
local have = "" local name = ""
if args[2] == nil or args[2] == "" then name = args[1] else name = args[2] end
if WindsTable[name]["Need"] == "YES" then have = "NEED" else have = "HAVE" end
if casefocus == 5 then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") else local focuscase = "Case " .. casefocus
if WindsTable[name]["Case"] == focuscase then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") end end end -- inventory_winds
function selling_winds(name, line, args, styles) local w = 0
for i, s in ipairs(styles) do ColourTell(RGBColourToName(s.textcolour), "", s.text) end
local name = args.piece local have = ""
if WindsTable[args.piece]["Need"] == "YES" then have = "NEED" else have = "HAVE" end
if casefocus == 5 then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") else local focuscase = "Case " .. casefocus
if WindsTable[name]["Case"] == focuscase then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") end end end -- selling_winds
function WindsAuction(name, line, args, styles) for i, s in ipairs(styles) do ColourTell(RGBColourToName(s.textcolour), "", s.text) end
local have = "" local name = args[2]
if WindsTable[args[2]]["Need"] == "YES" then have = "NEED" else have = "HAVE" end
if casefocus == 5 then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") else local focuscase = "Case " .. casefocus
if WindsTable[name]["Case"] == focuscase then ColourNote("magenta", "", " [", "cyan", "", WindsTable[name]["Case"], "magenta", "", " | ", "cyan", "", have, "magenta", "", "]") end end end -- WindsAuction
function ClearCase(name, line, wc) if tonumber(wc[1]) == 1 or tonumber(wc[1]) == 2 or tonumber(wc[1]) == 3 or tonumber(wc[1]) == 4 then local casename = "Case " .. wc[1]
ColourNote (msg_colour, "", "Clearing Collector Case ", qty_colour, "", wc[1])
for i,v in pairs(WindsTable) do cardname = i
if WindsTable[cardname]["Case"] == casename then WindsTable[cardname]["Need"] = "YES" WindsTable[cardname]["Color"] = "RED" end end else ColourNote (err_colour, "", "Valid options are ", qty_colour, "", "clearcase 1-4", err_colour, "", ".") end
SaveState() end -- ClearCase
function TouchObelisk() GetRoom()
if tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39902 then SendNoEcho ("touch obelisk")
world.EnableGroup ("WindsRun", 1) else ColourNote(err_colour, "", "You are not in the correct room to ", qty_colour, "", "TOUCH OBELISK", err_colour, "", ". You must be in ", qty_colour, "", "An Unholy Grove - 39902") end end -- TouchObelisk
function SearchFloor() GetRoom()
if tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39913 then SendNoEcho ("search floor") else ColourNote(err_colour, "", "You are not in the correct room to ", qty_colour, "", "SEARCH FLOOR", err_colour, "", ". You must be in ", qty_colour, "", "Within the Ruins of a Great Library - 39913") end end -- SearchFloor
function ClearBooks() GetRoom()
if tonumber(gmcproomid) == 39913 then SendNoEcho ("clear books") else ColourNote(err_colour, "", "You are not in the correct room to ", qty_colour, "", "CLEAR BOOKS", err_colour, "", ". You must be in ", qty_colour, "", "Within the Ruins of a Great Library - 39913") end end -- ClearBooks
function NodHynes() SendNoEcho ("nod hynes") end -- NodHynes
function NodHynesEnable() world.EnableGroup ("WindsRunNodHynes", 1) end -- NodHynesEnable

function CheckWindsTimer(name, line, wc) world.EnableGroup ("WindsTimer", 1) SendNoEcho ("tell nothamil timer")
if wc[1] == nil or wc[1] == "" then else repchan = wc[1] end end -- CheckWindsTimer
function WindsTimerEnd() SendNoEcho (repchan .. " @DYou are free to run winds.") world.EnableGroup ("WindsTimer", 0) end -- WindsTimerEnd
function WindsTimerLeft(name, line, wc) windshours = wc[1] windsminutes = wc[2] windsseconds = wc[3] end -- WindsTimerLeft
function WindsTimerDisplay(name, line, wc) local hour = wc[1] local minute = wc[2] local day = wc[3]
if tonumber(hour) > 12 then hour = 12 - tonumber(hour) AMPM = "PM" else AMPM = "AM" end
hour = string.gsub (hour, "-", "")
SendNoEcho (repchan .. " @DWinds Timer @R" .. windshours .. "@D:@R" .. windsminutes .. "@D:@R" .. windsseconds .. "@D. Your timer will be up on @R" .. day .. " @Dat @R" .. hour .. "@D:@R" .. minute .. " @D" .. AMPM .. ".@w")
if repchan == "tracker" then else repchan = "tracker" end
world.EnableGroup ("WindsTimer", 0) end -- WindsTimerDisplay
function CaseFocus(name, line, wc) if wc[1] == nil or wc[1] == "" then ColourNote(err_colour, "", "ERROR Contact Tallimos") else casefocus = tonumber(wc[1]) ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "Case Focus has been turned on and set to ", qty_colour, "", casefocus) end
SaveState() end -- CaseFocus
function CaseFocusToggle() ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "Case Focus has been turned off") casefocus = 5
SaveState() end -- CaseFocusToggle
function CaseFocusDisplay() if casefocus == 1 then ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "You are currently focusing on Case #1 - ", "yellow", "", "Collector Case") elseif casefocus == 2 then ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "You are currently focusing on Case #2 - ", "yellow", "", "Expansion Case") elseif casefocus == 3 then ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "You are currently focusing on Case #3 - ", "yellow", "", "Memorial & IMM Case") elseif casefocus == 4 then ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "You are currently focusing on Case #4 - ", "yellow", "", "Original & IMM Case") elseif casefocus == 5 then ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "You are currently not focusing on any case.") end
SaveState() end -- CaseFocusDisplay
function twe_help() local title = "Tallimos' Winds Extras v" .. PLUGIN_VERSION .. " Help" local title2 = noteline
spacing = HelpSpacing(title, title2)
ColourNote(help_colour, "", spacing, help_command_colour, "", title) ColourNote(help_colour, "", noteline) ColourNote(help_colour, "", "This plugin gives the user a nice way of keeping track of their cards. It will show the user if") ColourNote(help_colour, "", "they need the cards when they check the market. Also included are some commands that will help") ColourNote(help_colour, "", "with Winds epic runs.") ColourNote(help_colour, "", noteline)
Note("")
ColourNote(help_colour, "", "Card Management") ColourNote(help_colour, "", "---------------")
ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "checkwinds", help_colour, "", " - command use to check the market for cards | command can be ", help_colour, "", "shortened to ", help_command_colour, "", "wcw")
ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "checkdeck #", help_colour, "", " - command use to check and see which winds card you have for that particular case") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", " ", help_colour, "", "command can be shortened to ", help_command_colour, "", "cdeck #", help_colour, "", " or ", help_command_colour, "", "wcd #")
ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "clearcase #", help_colour, "", " - command use to clear the checklist for that particular case command can be") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", " ", help_colour, "", " shortened to ", help_command_colour, "", "wcc #")
ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "casefocus #", help_colour, "", " - command use to set a focus for for a particular case. If set you will only be") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", " ", help_colour, "", " told which cards you need for that case when looking at market, auction and") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", " ", help_colour, "", " inventory. command can be shortened to ", help_command_colour, "", "wcf #") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", " ", help_colour, "", " - use ", help_command_colour, "", "casefocus off", help_colour, "", " to turn off case focus") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", " ", help_colour, "", " - ", help_command_colour, "", "casefocus", help_colour, "", " on its own will show you the focused case")
Note("")
ColourNote(help_colour, "", "Epic Run Commands") ColourNote(help_colour, "", "-----------------")
ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "wto", help_colour, "", " - command used to touch obelisk") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "caged", help_colour, "", " - command used in the trap rooms") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "wsf", help_colour, "", " - command used to search floor") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "wcb", help_colour, "", " - command used to clear books") ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "wnh", help_colour, "", " - command used to nod hynes") Note("")
ColourNote(help_colour, "", "Other") ColourNote(help_colour, "", "-----")
ColourNote(help_command_colour, "", "windstimer ", optional_colour, "", "<channel>", help_colour, "", " - displays how much time you have left on your winds run timer.")
ColourNote(help_colour, "", noteline) Note("") end -- twe_help
function HelpSpacing(title, title2) local leng = tonumber(string.len(title)) local leng2 = tonumber(string.len(title2))
local spacing = 0 local lendif = 0
if leng > leng2 then else lendif = leng2 - leng lendif = lendif * 0.5 end
spacing = string.rep(" ", lendif)
return spacing end -- HelpSpacing
function OnPluginInstall() PLUGIN_VERSION = GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 19) PLUGIN_NAME = GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1)
GetSavedData()
ColourNote(msg_colour, "", "Thank you for installing ", qty_colour, "", "Tallimos' Winds Extras v" .. PLUGIN_VERSION, msg_colour, "", ". Please see ", help_command_colour, "", "twe help", msg_colour, "", " for more information.") Note("")
ColourNote(help_colour, "", "To get started all you have to do is start identifying your cases.") Note("")
ColourNote(help_colour, "", "Still to be added - ", help_command_colour, "", "stuff for when you turn in a deck") Note("") end -- OnPluginInstall
function OnPluginEnable() GetSavedData() end -- OnPluginEnable
function OnPluginSaveState() SetVariable ("WindsTable", "WindsTable = " .. serialize.save_simple (WindsTable)) SetVariable ("casefocus", "casefocus = " .. serialize.save_simple (casefocus)) SetVariable ("wepastfirstinstall", "true") end -- OnPluginSaveState
function GetSavedData() if GetVariable ("wepastfirstinstall") == "true" then assert (loadstring (GetVariable ("WindsTable") or "")) () assert (loadstring (GetVariable ("casefocus") or "")) () else CreateWindsTable() casefocus = 5 end
SaveState() end -- GetSavedData
